statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score, MAX(satisfaction_level) AS max_satisfaction FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_satisfaction > 4 ORDER BY avg_score DESC

SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id, satisfaction_level HAVING satisfaction_level = 5 ORDER BY customer_id, feedback_count DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sentiment_score) AS total_score FROM customer_feedback WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_score > 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_satisfaction < 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerSatisfaction JOIN CustomerFeedback ON CustomerSatisfaction.feedback_id = CustomerFeedback.feedback_id
SELECT satisfaction_level, COUNT(satisfaction_id) AS total_count FROM CustomerSatisfaction GROUP BY satisfaction_level
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' AND sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT cf.feedback_id, cs.satisfaction_level FROM CustomerFeedback cf INNER JOIN CustomerSatisfaction cs ON cf.feedback_id = cs.feedback_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_level) AS avg_satisfaction FROM CustomerSatisfaction GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_satisfaction > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedbacks;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedbacks ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level >= 4;
SELECT DISTINCT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_date, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedbacks GROUP BY feedback_date ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_name FROM customer_feedbacks JOIN customer_sentiments ON customer_feedbacks.sentiment_score = customer_sentiments.sentiment_id WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT satisfaction_level, COUNT(satisfaction_id) AS total_satisfactions FROM customer_satisfaction GROUP BY satisfaction_level ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, predicted_level FROM PredictedSatisfaction WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM SentimentAnalysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, analysis_date ASC;
SELECT satisfaction_id, customer_id, satisfaction_level FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 AND satisfaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT prediction_id, customer_id, MAX(predicted_level) AS highest_predicted_level FROM PredictedSatisfaction GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON CustomerFeedback.feedback_id = SentimentAnalysis.feedback_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_label, confidence_score FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT feedback_text, sentiment_score FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 10

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_info INNER JOIN satisfaction_levels ON customer_info.customer_id = satisfaction_levels.customer_id WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3
SELECT prediction_id, feedback_id, satisfaction_prediction FROM prediction_results ORDER BY prediction_id ASC
